code: import*as types from"./actionType";export function addAuthor(author){return{type:types.ADD_AUTHOR,author:author};}export function updateAuthor(author){return{type:types.UPDATE_AUTHOR,author:author};}export function getAuthors(authors){return{type:types.GET_AUTHORS,authors:authors};}export function deleteAuthor(author){return{type:types.DELETE_AUTHOR,author:author};}export function loadAuthors(){var authors=[{id:1,name:"First Author",bookIds:[],rating:3.5},{id:2,name:"Second Author",bookIds:[],rating:2.5},{id:3,name:"Third Author",bookIds:[],rating:4.5}];return function(dispatch){dispatch(getAuthors(authors));};}
